title: Tizona
summaries: The Tizona is a post-Ocram sword that has the ability to cause the Bleeding debuff upon impact. It is capable of autoswing and prevents the player from turning while swinging. When swung, a yellow/red fire animation is shown, similar to the visuals of the Fiery Greatsword, but does not inflict the On Fire! debuff.
On the [img:Console version] Console version and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, the Tizona was replaced with a Chlorophyte Claymore upon updating to the 1.3.0.1 equivalent.
